application.summary: Turn-based war game similar to Warlords II

description.p: A turn-based strategy game where up to 8 players strive for control of as many cities as possible. Produce new armies in cities to conquer nearby cities. Using the income from those cities, make more armies to take more cities. Send a hero to a temple to get a quest, or maybe search a nearby ruin instead.
You can play against the computer or over the network, and you can make your own scenarios in the scenario editor.
